s.description: This is a sample for hatool's scripting engine, used to demonstrate some of its features
s.name: Sample Hatool script

steps.say: Hi, My name is Ava, i can help you with your online investing questions.
Are you new to online investing with BMO or do you have an account with us?

options.show: I'm new to online investing with BMO
I have an existing online investing account

steps.say: Happy to help. BMO InvestorLine online investing services offer independent investors excellent service and fast trade execution for a wide range of investments. Our competitive rates and professional level tools are designed to give you easy access to online investing.
